mapper.select: SELECT user_id, phone, nick_name, password, gender, birthday, avatar_url, register_time, last_login_time, minor, auth, status, last_logoff_time, personal_signature FROM user WHERE phone = #{phone} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET nick_name = #{nickname}, password = #{password}, avatar_url = #{avatar}, gender = #{gender}, birthday = #{birthday} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user WHERE phone LIKE CONCAT(#{phonePrefix}, '%') OR phone LIKE CONCAT('+86', #{phonePrefix}, '%')
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE phone LIKE CONCAT(#{phonePrefix}, '%') OR phone LIKE CONCAT('+86', #{phonePrefix}, '%')
